name: Inazuma Serve Da!! Super Beach Volley
name_original: Inazuma Serve Da!! Super Beach Volley
description:
Inazuma Serve Da!! Super Beach Volley is a sports game developed by Virgin Interactive Entertainment. It came out on 04-08-1995. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Inazuma Serve Da!! Super Beach Volley is available on SNES.
